SIP Buddy

Your intelligent partner in simplifying Systematic Investment Plans.

What is SIP Buddy?

SIP Buddy is a smart investment planning tool designed to demystify mutual fund investing through Systematic Investment Plans (SIPs). We leverage the power of AI to provide you with a data-driven, personalized investment strategy. Our goal is to make long-term wealth creation accessible, understandable, and achievable for everyone, regardless of their financial expertise.

Key Features

AI-Powered Planner

Get a personalized SIP investment plan based on your unique financial profile, risk tolerance, and goals.

Interactive Dashboard

Visualize projections, compare mutual funds, save your plans, and export detailed reports as PDFs.

Smart AI Assistant

Chat with SIP Buddy using voice or text. Get instant answers to your financial queries powered by advanced AI.

Comprehensive Calculators

Plan for every scenario with our advanced SIP, SWP, Lumpsum, and new Income Tax calculators.

Advisor Locator

Need professional help? Find registered financial advisors near your location with our integrated map tool.

FinIQ Challenge

Test your financial literacy with our gamified quiz. Compete against time, earn scores, and learn while you play.

Learning Center

Empower yourself with knowledge. Our learn section breaks down complex investment topics into simple concepts.

Our Goal

Our primary mission is to empower you with the tools and knowledge needed to make informed investment decisions. We believe that by providing clear, unbiased, and personalized guidance, we can help you navigate the complexities of the financial markets and confidently work towards achieving your financial dreams.

AI-powered investment planning for everyone. Build a smarter financial future with confidence.
